values:
i just signed up for twitter. i want to see what the hype is all about. 

add me: twitter.com/iheartgarage

its official! i am an auntie!!! 

if anyone wants to check out the pic i have, its on my myspace! <3

What Valerie Means
You are very hyper. You never slow down, even when it's killing you. You're the type of person who can be a workaholic during the day... and still have the energy to party all night. Your energy is definitely a magnet for those around you. People are addicted to your vibe. You are usually the best at everything ... you strive for perfection. You are confident, authoritative, and aggressive. You have the classic "Type A" personality. You are relaxed, chill, and very likely to go with the flow. You are light hearted and accepting. You don't get worked up easily. Well adjusted and incredibly happy, many people wonder what your secret to life is. You are friendly, charming, and warm. You get along with almost everyone. You work hard not to rock the boat. Your easy going attitude brings people together. At times, you can be a little flaky and irresponsible. But for the important things, you pull it together. You are wild, crazy, and a huge rebel. You're always up to something. You have a ton of energy, and most people can't handle you. You're very intense. You definitely are a handful, and you're likely to get in trouble. But your kind of trouble is a lot of fun. You tend to be pretty tightly wound. It's easy to get you excited... which can be a good or bad thing. You have a lot of enthusiasm, but it fades rather quickly. You don't stick with any one thing for very long. You have the drive to accomplish a lot in a short amount of time. Your biggest problem is making sure you finish the projects you start.
What's Your Name's Hidden Meaning?

What Valerie Means
V is for Visionary A is for Amazing L is for Lively E is for Ebullient R is for Refreshing I is for Intelligent E is for Excellent
What Does Your Name Mean?
i finally got my sunglasses yesterday. i love em.

well my store manager called me into his office today. i sat down w/ him and laura (the hr manager), and discussed the feedback from my final team lead interview. richard (my store manager) started the convo w/ "you really dont interview well, do you?" i thought i wasnt getting it. he then told me that they see my potential, and they feel that i would be a great asset to the team! i got the promotion!!!!!!!!

well i have an update and boy is it a crazy one. 

well i got a call from greg tonight. he has been calling me every other day since he broke up with me. every conversation was almost the same. he would ask if any guys have come out of the "woodwork", basically asking if im talking to anyone. well of course i havent, since we just broke up last week. well today he calls, and i decide to call him back. he starts off the convo the same way, and i was like, "no. im not talking to anyone. why do you have someone else?" reminder it has only been a week, and we were together for 2+ years. well he comes out and says he is dating someone else. he told me last tuesday (the day after we broke up), that someone messaged him b/c they heard he was single. well he wouldnt tell me who then, but he made it clear he was NOT interested. well, tonight he tells me that they are dating. guess who it is? none other than someone i considered to be a good friend of mine. i had been telling jj, patrick, and loryn that this girl hadnt even commented to me about my break up with greg. she had made excuses about being emo. when really her ass was going behind my back to get with greg. i think its really funny that said girl has herpes. i also find it really funny that greg brought up doing a 3some with her numerous times during our relationship. it makes me think back to mine and loryns bday thing, since greg and said girl were all buddy buddy all night. i find it really fucking strange that they are all official not even a week after we broke up. they both have said that nothing happend before, but i have a really hard time believing that. in the past, jj made comments about her being all "single white female" towards me, and how she was going to try and steal greg. 

i think the whole thing is a total bitch move on both of their parts. dont go behind my back and formulate a fucking plan. they both knew what they were doing, and i can honestly say that i hate them both. i dont want greg, and i defintely dont need some desperate stalker bitch as a friend. greg said he didnt want any drama caused by our breakup and i really think i handled the whole thing in a very mature manner. i accepted it, and  i understood that maybe things just werent working. greg always told me that he wouldnt start dating anyone for a while, b/c he needed time to get over me. bullshit! at this moment, i dont think he gave 2 shits about me or my feelings. i find it really funny that he has continued to tell me that he loves me, but he is already with someone knew. im absolutely appauld that he would make it one of my so called "friends". i realize now that she wasnt a friend. on my birthday, she smiled in my face, while she flirted with my boyfriend. both of them deny anything happening before we broke up, but wtf is flirting with my then boyfriend? 

i dont need either one of them in my life, and honestly, i wish i never would have met greg. i really thought that we would be able to maintain a friendship, but i realize that he was just smiling in my face and going behind my back. i hope they are happy, b/c obviously they are ment for each other. i am sure she will end up his rebound, since thats how she always is. i should have fucking known since she has done this in the past. unfortunately, i am a trusting individual, and i actually thought we were friends. boy was i wrong. 

incase you are wondering who gregs lucky new girl is: its mariel (aka bassjunkie)

you know the saying "when it rains, it pours"? its so true. 


update: 

greg and i broke up. it had been coming for a while, but i guess i didnt think it would be yesterday. i am hurt, and sad by the situation. i love him with all my heart, but i guess we are just not supposed to be together. our lives are going in completely different directions. i hope that we will be able to be/stay close, and i dont regret anything about our relationship what so ever. i met him when i needed someone to motivate me, and help me find my way. he has done so much for me. he helped me get my life back together after going through hell and back. i am very thankful for the time we spent together.

well. where do i begin? i havent commented or posted lately, b/c i had an issue with my computer and its still out of commission. greg reformatted it, and we cant get the sound card to work or the ethernet card. sucks. i havent had much time to mess with it or look into the issue. i have my sidekick, so im not completely w/o, but the sk can be annoying. 

new stuff with me: 

i made the dean's list at school. i never imagined that i would ever be on the dean's list. i showed my parents the letter, and they hung it on the fridge. im sure they were just as shocked as i was. a lot has changed since high school- thats for sure. 

i have found something to calm my nonexistent attention span. sudoku. i tried to do the puzzle in the paper this morning, and man that is hard! i worked on it for 3 hours straight. i didnt realize the first hour that i was doing it wrong. (heh) i have never concentrated on anything for so long in my life. i have no focus, and i realize that, so what is it with sudoku. i almost consider them addictive. 

i ended up transffering out of my anp2 class. i have decided to take the accelerated 8week class with the teacher i had last semester. the teacher i got for anp2 is terrible, and i felt like he was wasting my time and money. i am not paying him, so that i can teach myself anatomy. i am paying him to teach me. he was an idiot anyways. i would much rather work twice as hard for less the time with the teacher i really liked. my chemistry class is going surprisingly well. i was worried since i suck at science, but i think anp1 gave me a little boost to help me with this. anp 1 had a chapter on chem and bio-chem, so i was a little refreshed coming into this. so far, so good with chem. i am glad, since i was really worried going into the semester. 

greg is fabulous. he just had a birthday, so i made him a german chocolate cake. he loved the cake. boyfriend. *swoon*

yes, i'm a dork and i still color easter eggs. i have been all excited do color them all week. i had a hello kitty kit and a speckled egg kit. i LOVE how bright the hello kitty eggs are. i didnt really use the stamp since it didnt come out right. and the stickers arent all that cute. pictures: be jealous <3
happy birthday krista!!!

omg omg omg omg omg

HAWTHORNE HEIGHTS IS PLAYING AT THE HOUSE OF BLUES!

sunday, decmeber 11th

i think im dying. this is exactly what i was hoping for. now i just need to find someone to go with me. (hint greg please hint)

oh, and they are playing with silverstein, bayside, and aiden. omg, hawthorne heights! <3

loryn: thank you for helping me with my livejournal earlier. you always do cool stuff with yours and i just sit here like duh. 



everyone else: you should <3 me and loryn and buy us tickets for 3 doors down. we promise we will be nice to you and show you the pictures we take at the concert! 

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=6543467851&rd=1&sspagename=STRK%3AMEWA%3AIT&rd=1

that link is for tickets in the pit. in case you dont know those are THE BEST tickets you can get. best part? they are only 99$ for both tickets. so yah. someone love us. we <3 3 doors down.
what kind of entry would this be without puppies?

congrats jj and patrick <3
i am so glad i could be the witness. how fun. parties and gifts!

i went over to jj and patricks. we had a L word marathon. i am almost completely caught up now. only 3 more episodes to go. i <3 the L word. "shane is so slutty" i think i said that at least 2 times per episode. i still need to sneak out that cute kitty!

why does the weather have to suck? its so cold out. cant it just stay at 70? that is the best weather. none of this cold and rain junk.

i just got this urge to play mini golf. too bad they dont have mini golf places that are open at 3am. i would be there. i might have a lil frisbee golf date with greg. i dont think he has ever played so maybe i can kick his butt. i am terrible at it so who knows.

i finally got beth's postcard in the mail yesterday. it took 8days to get here from seattle. beth has been back all week. its funny when you get a postcard after the fact. especially since she has already told me all abou the trip. :)

i have been thinking a lot the past few days. its been a mix of things.
attn: krista. i am mailing your letter in the morning.
as of now my journal will be friends only.

i am updating from tennessee. thursday dan took me to the cajun grill. mmmm. yum. we came back to his house and i met his roommate brandon and their friend dusty. those 3 played records on this radio show for a while. on friday, brandon doesnt have class. so he took me to play frisbe golf while dan was at work. wow. that game is hard. i am going to practice when i come home and next time i can kick some butt. i guess the par or whatever is supposed to be 4. it took me at least 8 try's. i guess that is really popular here. its fun though. last night dan and i debated on going to excess. we ended up staying in since we have lots of stuff to do and we were both pretty tired. tonight dan, brandon, and dusty will play at the muse. they go on at midnight so thats where i will be. im going to see dans parents in a lil bit. that will be fun. his family is so nice. :)

talks are really good. greg came over tonight and i'm really glad we talked about some things. 

i leave for tennessee later today. i will be gone until the 5th. im sure it will be lots of fun.

i cant believe i leave for tennessee in 2 days. i should have already been there since the 12th. im glad i pushed the date back. having this week off work has been so fun. i have actually done quite a bit. yesterday was great. im really excited about tennessee. i was kind of eh about it, but now i am starting to get hyped up! i wish my clothes would pack themselves.
i woke up with the worst headache. i went back to bed 3 times and i finally got up at noon. i cant seem to shake this headache. i am not in the mood to pack, but i need to.

yesterday (monday)

i had such a great time. jj and patrick picked me up around 1230pm. we went out to jerry's house. the whole ride there was hilarious. when we got to jerry's loryn was already there. i had talked to fucker a lil on aim and told him that loryn and i would be at the mall and he should meet us there. we hung out at jerry's for a while. loryn and i kept slacking at leaving and chris was stuck waiting for us at the mall. we couldnt get in the damn mall! we circled the thing a bunch of times since no one would let us over. damn traffic. we didnt shop long at all. i bought a game (simpsons jeopordy) for jj's bday gift. i finally went in an H&m store! they have some cute stuff. i couldnt buy anything since i am trying to pay off my credit cards and i leave for tennessee thursday. :) we went back to jerry's. we all hung out a while and waited for adam to show up. jerry, adam, fucker, olivia, loryn, an' i went to steak and shake while jj and patrick went on a romantic dinner date to the cheesecake factory. (they got me cheesecake. it was HUGE. mmm. i ate some and its yummy.) after steak and shake olivia and fucker went there way and the rest of us went back to jerrys. jj and patrick came back and we all hung out until about midnight. i had such a great time. i am so glad i went out there. jj, patrick, and i went on a 7-11 hunt. the blue slushie sucked! lucky patrick traded me and bought me a red<3

happy birthday jj!@#$%^&*

i am on vacation. i was supposed to leave for tennessee on the 12th. due to being sick and what not i post poned until the 24th. so i am only going for a week and a half instead of 3 weeks. im excited to see dan. i havent seen him since august. when i get off the plane we are going to the cajun place. *yum*

i had a great time valentines day.  greg came out and we hung out. we went to the mall and he bought me this really cute purse. since we returned the games i got him for his bday we shopped for a new gift for him. he ended up picking out some shoes. i like the shoes. he refused my attempts at talking him into a pink shirt. pink shirtS<3 we went to the scary store so he could get birthday idea's for me. i saw the cutest skirt. its camo and oh so cute. i want it so bad. after the mall we went to chili's. chili's was nice after that we came back to my house and watched friday night lights. well i only half way watched. i was so tired i was falling asleep a lil.

i have decided to look into interior design school. i still really want to be a chef but i like interior design too. ugh. i need to pick a career.   

i am so bored.

i went to my grandma's and took her a lil valentine with a lil gift thing. she was suprised. im glad i didnt get her flowers, since she already had a dozen pink roses on her bar. they were very pretty. i went and sat in the living room with my grandma and she was watching the food channel. what is with people and the food channel? am i uncool b/c i cant stand watching the food channel. jj was watching that all night last night when i was over. they are having chocolate weekend or something. i saw one of the same programs that was on last night when i was at jj's. i'm really glad i went over to my grandma's. i used to see her so much more than i do now. when i was getting ready to get out of the car i started thinking about skipper and my eyes started to water. i want to get a frame later tonight so i can put a pic of him on my computer desk.

i hung out with my mom saturday afternoon. i bought a few things. we discussed skipper and had a good time. i went over to jj and patricks around 7pm. we sat around and played simpsons jepordy. it was fun. im really glad i went over there. we always have such a good time. definitly something i needed.

my parents have said that skipper was brave. he freaked out the whole way to the vet, and he cried the whole time they sat and waited. he had been crying a lot more lately. for no reason at all. i guess my mom was filling out the paperwork and she noticed a magazine. it talked about dogs getting skin cancer. from what my parents said the lady at the vet was really nice. my parents sat with skipper until it was time. my mom said that the lady went to take skipper and he went right to her. my mom and i were both a little nervous about that. he would growl at us sometimes when we would hold him. which was probably due to the pain. im trying to tell myself that this is better. its just so weird not having him sleeping under my desk. everytime i write in my livejournal he is always under my feet. its going to be weird not having him. chief is already noticing. he keeps walking around looking where skipper would normallly be. my mom took him out when they got back from taking skipper and she said he was just looking around outside. like skipper should be out there with him. i am curious how my brother will take it. i was awake when my parents left so i got to say goodbye. well as good as you can in the situation. tim wasnt here though. he knew it was coming, but im sure he would have liked to say goodbye. my mom said when she was paying she almost yelled stop. my mom had a really hard time with this. my dad seems to be taking it pretty well. this is weird since skipper was my first dog ever. his bday is feb 18th. and he would have been 14. (technically he is 14, b/c we got him when he was about 8weeks old, but we celebrate his bday the day we got him) i miss him so much already.

well my parents just took skipper to the vet. its going to be weird when they come home without him. he was just sleeping so peacefully. its like i know it needs to be done but i dont want it to. this sucks a lot. :(

i have decided i cant take it anymore. i am going to give in and go to the doctor. its been almost a full week and i am still sooooo sick. i thought i was getting a lil better yesterday... that was wrong. i was so sick last night i cant believe i made it through work. why am i so sick? i usually dont get sick at all.

southwest airlines suck! i called them to change my flight from this saturday to next saturday and the lady told me i would have to pay $170! thats crazy. if i wait a couple extra days i can just buy a new ticket for $40. why would i wasnt $170. blah. i cant leave for vacation sick. waiting has some great advantages.. i get to spend valentines day with the boy im all *swoon* for. <3

greg left around 5am. i keep him out so late. im such a bad influence. i like passing out with him. i'm really glad he came over. i almost told him not to b/c i was sick. he said he would take care of me. (awww) i think i ended up getting him sick. he wasnt feeling so hot when he left. it could have been due to his lack of sleep. now he has to go teach all day. i have decided we dont have pg nights. :) we watched monster. it was okay. i wasnt paying complete attention. it seemed ok though. we returned his 2 xbox games. this saturday we are going to go shopping and he can get something else. he is also looking for gift idea's for things i would like for my bday.!!!! my birthday is a just under 2 months away. my birthday is on a saturday this year. i will be spending it with greg and i believe we will have a night on the town <3

i feel miserable. im so sick. my chest hurts. it burns when i cough. i hope i get better today. maybe i will magically feel better when i wake up. eh. you never know.. but i doubt it.

i was just looking around my room for my plane ticket info for my trip to tennessee. it seems to be mia. my room is not messy and i cant find it! this is why i like my room messy. its easier to find things when there is a bunch of clutter. i am good with clutter. i might change my date to come back. i think i want to come back a week early. 3 weeks is a long time. i might see if i can get a mid week flight after the first week. we will see. *hopes*

so i woke up tonight and my chest is all congested. i feel completely fine except my breathing sucks. im glad im off work tonight. last night went pretty well. nothing too crazy except this lady left her kid at the shelter without any supervision. parenting at its finest. *rolls eyes*

my brother was nice and hooked up my super nintendo. so i have become a video game nerd as of a couple hours ago. :) i suck at video games so it keeps me entertained for a long time.

greg is coming over tomorrow! we are hanging out. im not sure exactly what we are doing. i think we might play dance dance revolution and catch a movie. i will kick his butt this time at ddr! i will not be wearing a skirt and volatile shoes, so he is going down. the night will end with a  hot make out session, of course. <3 we talked on the phone for almost 3 hours. he is so nice. he offered to come over tonight since i was feeling a little sick when i woke up. im going to stop being all mushy again. haha. i dont think anyone wants to read all that.

why does robotussin have to taste so disgusting? ugh. i should get more sleep.

i spent my weekend working. i was supposed to be off friday and saturday but i ended up getting called in both days. before work on friday i got 4 hours of sleep. then saturday i went to get my hair done (it took 5 hours! that is way too long... my ass was asleep in the chair) i finally got out of there at 430pm. i went home and not even an hour after i got home my boss called. she needed me to work midnights. i agreed but afterwards it hit me that i had originally agreed to work last night for someone else. after i got the hours my boss took them away and gave them to a prn. she said she has to offer them the hours first. (shady) so saturday gets here and i work anyways b/c the prn called off too. ha.

i just had a lovely distraction from my livejournal. greg <3 it looks like i will be seeing him wednesday and saturday. on wednesday we can return his bday gift and he can pick out something else. the attention i have been recieving from him lately rocks. more random messages lots more talking. the seeing each other more thing is working out great. <3 *swoon*

my hair came out ok. its a lot lighter. the hair cut is Really cute though. i am definitly happy with the layers. im glad i decided against long bangs. the shortest layer looks like long bangs.

i ended up working last night. i didnt have anything planned anyways. i was in the worst mood yesterday when i went to bed. i dont know what my problem was. i was just all over the place. work last night was ok. it will just give me extra cash for my trip to tennessee.

i think i have finally picked out a haircut. i just need to decide if i want to add dark brown, blond, or red. i dont know if i want all over highlights or just the tips done. or do i want just the underneath! ah. i have been thinking about this since before new years. i really need to just make a decision and stick to it. i was going to add black but i am backing out of that. that would be too drastic i think. my skin is too fair for such a dark look.

yesterday was gregs bday. i took him out to dinner at the olive garden. i gave him the 2 xbox games i bought him. he will have to return the games b/c he already has them. he mentioned buying a digital camera instead. thats fine with me. i knew there was a chance he would already have the games.  dinner was nice. after dinner we went back to my house. he met my parents for the first time. that went well. he talked to my mom for a little bit. it was really cool. my parents both like him. my dad made the comment that he is talkative. which is a very good thing. greg gave me my christmas gift. he got me this cute sweater and a pink jacket shirt thing. they were both on a wish list i made. i <3 both of them lots. i cant wait to wear them. we hung out and tried to watch bourne identity. we didnt end up watching much. hehe. he took a nap and then left around 4am. i kept him up almost all night on a school night! *i feel special* you know what drives me nuts? i like him. i really like what we have, but i want more. (more more more<3) i really like how nice he is and he is so sincere. its like when we are together everything is perfect. *stops before getting all mushy*

i hate cleaning my room. why cant i just put things where they go when i finish with them? nope. that would be too easy. instead i like to leave it in random places to pick up "later" i spend more time cleaning my room due to lazyness than any other reason. oh i love when im looking for something (ex. clothes) and i pull all the clothes out and throw them all over the floor. of course i am in a hurry so i dont have time to pick them up until... LATER! so later is finally here... my room is completely trashed and greg is coming over later today. well i am not in the mood to clean. it took me about 2 hours to clean off my desk. why? b/c i like to get distracted. i sit waiting for a good distraction. well at 5am i ran out of distractions. my room is semi clean now. i just need to finish up but i got distracted again. haha. distractions and later... the story of my life.

i cant wait until wednesday. i have a wonderful gift idea. i cant even talk about it just incase that person is reading. i'm so excited! i was worried b/c its getting last minute and i was having issues thinking of something. i had idea's but nothing really grabbed me. yay!

i wish the snow would stop! its been snowing all day and night. i want to get my hair done in the morning. looks like thats not going to happen. at least i got a nice phone call tonight. i really liked the things said in the convo. he said he would like to see more of me. <3 maybe things might work out after all! i cant wait til his birthday. i still have no idea what i am going to get him. i want to get him something good. i have 2 places in mind for dinner.

i watched forgotten last night. i really liked the movie but i hated the ending. im not going to say what i hated b/c i dont want to ruin the movie for anyone who hasnt seen it. i still need to watch collateral. i have heard mixed reviews on that. my new goal is to try and watch movies as i burn them. i have all these movies i have never seen yet i own them.

i looked into netflix earlier. i think i might sign up. it said its only 11.95 per month. thats a lot cheaper than renting from blockbuster. i can always rent some from blockbuster if needed.

i have decided i hate being awake when everyone else is sleeping. i think too much at this time of night. my mind races all the time and its worse late.

so my parents arent so sure that skipper is getting put to sleep in the morning.due to the snowstorm they might wait. i cant decide if i am happy or sad about it. this past week has been so hard. i have been trying to mentally prepare for it. in this past week i have really noticed things about him. its like his weight loss is becoming so obvious. he isnt even chewing his food. he just swallows it whole. he cant handle the cold at all. i set him in the snow and he just shakes and cries. its getting worse just having to watch him. his going in and out is hard. watching him stare at the wall for 10 min at nothing! sometimes he acts back to normal. well kind of normal.

when i left work yesterday (tuesday morning) my boss had me stay over a minute. she gave me a performance coaching. i guess the corporate office caught on to my computer usage. haha. who would have thought the corporate office logs all computer usage. eh. i dont care much. it pissed me off a lil at first though.

my sleeping co-worker is gone! shocking i know. i dont know if she was fired or if she just quit. it sure took long enough. maybe they will hire someone that actually does something. i doubt it.

wow. im being negative.

i havent updated in a while. i really havent been in the mood. so lets see.

last week (monday or tuesday) i pissed greg off. it was to the point he didnt even want to speak to me. he had every right to be mad and after thinking about it.. i was making a stupid  decision. we ended up hanging out saturday as planned and everything was great. everything is always awesome when you put us together. sunday we went to this gyro place. i had my very first gyro. yum! i told greg he is making me worldly. haha. first a philly cheese steak and now a gyro. one of these days he is going to have me eating seaweed. (eh. i dont think so) the whole situation with us i'm just going with it. i want to see what happens. you never know but i am not going to get my hopes up.

work is work. i'm excited about my 3 weeks off. i would be content just staying home. i will be going to tennessee. my old best friend john (the one i moved to tennesee with) was talking to me on aim last night while i was at work. for a second i thought he was going to ask me to meet him for lunch while i am in tennessee. its really weird with me and him. i really miss him as a friend. we were so close. even all the shit that happend i cant be mean to him. it would seem much easier to tell him to fuck off and never speak to me again, but i cant. whenever i look at my old photo album from parties in chicago ( before i move) i always see all the pics of me and him. i never imagined we wouldnt be friends. i think we just ended up in a bad situation. john was always honest no matter what. i miss that. it was really nice to have a friendship where you never wonder if the person has some other intention. with him being as gay as gay can be.. there was never even a thought of "what if" or feelings starting.

my trip to tennessee! i havent talked to dan since before new years. i should call him sometime this week. i know i still have 4 weeks until i go. i just want to make sure we have everything figured out and that nothing happend. plus we usually at least say hi.. we are friends and what not.


i just started a new book last night at work. its called 10 stupid things women do to mess up their lives. its by dr. laura schlessinger. so far so good.  i have only read the first chapter.

skipper (maybe i should have made him his own entry)
well it looks like this week is it. i should be happy since he has made it this year. he is 14 years old. thats pretty old. he is almost completely blind (cataracts), he is dropping weight fast. he is a small dog anyways but you can see him hip bones, his hair is falling out. he is just falling apart. we believe he has cancer. my mom says he has that cancer smell. i guess people get it and dogs do as well. he is the first dog i ever had. it will just be weird to not have him. i guess my dad is going to take him one day this week (most likely saturday) i dont think i want to know when he takes him. well i do, but im sure i will freak. i can just imagine how skipper is going to act. thinking about it sucks. everytime i get all teary.

I just want you to know oh oh
That I think our love will grow yeah yeah

Baby cakes
You just don't know, know
How I I
I like it down low
And I just want you to know
That I think I love will grow
Will take it step by step
Because I'm not something you own [x2]

Confused don't know what I'm feeling
Confused relationships without meaning
In the mist I can see it gleaming
Time to wake up and stop the dreaming
Coz your my lil Baby cakes
And I know you got what it takes
The way you make me feel
The way that I am
when you talk to you friends
And you call me your man

i am starting to lose my compassion. lately some of the clients at my work are just unreal. they act like everyone owes them something. they think they should act anyway they want and that should be ok. they are completely rude and disrespectful to staff members. this lady this morning yelled at me at least 3 times. she was yelling about the most random shit. she feels that cereal is not good enough to serve to her kids. "Wtf:" you stay at the shelter for FREE! you dont have to pay for anything and you are going to bitch about the food? she thinks that eggs and pancakes are the only thing to serve. no. feeding 40 people eggs, bacon, and pancakes everyday would get quite expensive since people donate cereal and things like that. she pissed me off. i hate when people are ungrateful.

i am so proud of myself today. last night my soulseek deleted my user list and my dvd burner has been giving me errors and w/e. so today i fixed my soulseek and upgraded and got it all working. this doesnt sound like a big deal but i am computer retarded.. so it is a big deal for me. i also figured out what the problem with the dvd burning and managed to get back burning.

i was supposed to go work out with my cousin today.. she called and we set up a time, well she didnt end up going.. or calling.. :( i was a little annoyed about that. eh. i wish i was off again tonight.

you know what i hate. i hate hearing my personal thoughts coming out of other peoples mouths. there are certain things i think about myself. things that i really need to work on, but other people dont need to say it. maybe they were joking, but seriously... it just sucks hearing it. i dont want to go into detail b/c i dont even want to think about it. i am going to continue to work on it.. i guess it just gives me more motivation. if other people see it then i guess its out of hand.

well on to other things... im supposed to hang out with jj tonight. i doubt that happens since the roads suck! why does the weather have to suck? i hate ice. i hate snow. i hate winter now too!

new years eve went wonderful. i'm really glad that i hung out with greg and we did our own thing. everytime i see him i am in such a great mood. kissing him at midnight was just one of the many incredible parts of my nye/new years morning. i asked his opinion on my money situation. i know he thinks i am completely irresponsible with money. (maybe i am just a little.) he offered to help, but told me that i would have to take his suggestions. the one plus i have is that i always save reciepts when i use credit and debt cards. i am going to think about his suggestions and really work on it. he said NO more shopping. which is part of my new years resolution anyways.. since i do shop too much.

my new years resolutions this year are:
1. stop online shopping. i spend too much money buying clothes i see online. i do shop clearance but i dont always like what i get and im stuck with them.
2. quit all unhealthy relationships.
3. sign up for school
4. start using my membership to wwo. i pay 29$ a month and i never go. i think i went 4 times this past year. i also want to continue drinking at least 6 servings of water per day. also continue to eat healthy.
5. pay off and cancel one of my credit cards.. and pay off the other one.
6. set up a savings account.

so there it is. all the things i plan to do this year. i know i can do all of those things. it might take a little work but i can do them. actually i need to do them.. and there is no better time to start than now. i also plan to exercise on my lunch break at work. they have some excersice equipment at the shelter and what else do i have to do all night? i might spend a full hour exercising on slow days. its better than sitting on my butt reading magazines.. i can do that the other 5 boring hours of the night. hehe.

so my boss called me at 930am. i didnt know she called until about 1130am. i tried to call her but she must have been busy. so finally she calls me back around 2. i was really curious why she called me at home. it sounded pretty important. well she called b/c she needed me to go over an altercation between a staff member and a client the other night. i guess she had to talk to everyone about the incident and since the lady told me about stuff they had to ask me. it kind of sucks. you never want to admit that your co-worker was wrong. it just makes a weird work situation.

i work tonight and then i need to come home and get to sleep. i am hanging out with greg tomorrow night. <3 its going to be awesome like always. we are just going to do our own thing which is hot. i was hoping my new clothes would be here before friday i hope they come tomorrow. i want to wear the camo pants <3 they are hot! greg and i talked on the phone like 3 times yesterday for long periods. plus we were talking online quite a bit too. it was really great. i should have had him over last night.. but i was feeling really bad still. im glad he called to cheer me up. he is so sweet. im going to quit being all <3 whatever.

i am finally getting over being sick. i was only sick for 2 days but man it was a long two days. greg was sick a couple days before me so i am blaming him for making me sick. ^_^ it might not have been him since everyone has been sick lately... but o well.

everyone have a safe and happy nye!

being sick sucks. i have awesome plans for new years and this week i get sick as hell. greg is sick too. i should blame him for making me sick. :) i am sitting around talking to krista on aim. we are discussing boys and things. i need to write her again. work has been normal. there was a big event sunday.. but who knows what they will do about that. i doubt they do anything. my work is weird like that. i dont really have much to write.. must be because the nightquil is kicking my ass. sleep <3
